item.title: Damaged surface - the entire footpath, 8th September
item.description:
The entire footpath is in terrible condition. Uneven, potholes, chippings everywhere- this has been reported before. It is getting worse and worse. It needs to be completely resurfaced from end to end.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parkhurst Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead rat on a pavement., 8th September
item.description:
Ongoing problem with rats, foxes and bins. Overflowed bins become perfect feeders for foxes and rats. It is safety issue for animals and residents as rubbish is spread by animals into private drives and service roads. Please collect dead rat and review type and number of bins to prevent animals access to them(flaps type).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Park Avenue, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
